data.name: CreateObligationAssignment
ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID from CKT_OBLIGATION where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OB_ID = @obId)

data.name: ReadOfficeServiceProvider
data.value: select top(1) SPD_GENERATED_ID, OFF_GENERATED_ID, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_OFFC_SRVC_PRVR where (SPD_GENERATED_ID = @spdGeneratedId) and (OFF_GENERATED_ID = @offGeneratedId) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE = @effectiveDate) and (ROLE_CODE = @roleCode)
